title: Define Schema from an External Table or Schema Feature

questions.question: The ability to construct a dynamic schema from attributes in a workspace has many possibilities. One of these FME transformers automatically creates dynamic schema attributes specifically so you can create a new schema. Which is it?
What is a significant advantage of defining schema in an external table?
options: By being forced to edit a workspace to adapt to schema changes, you can use FME more often.
Schema will never change when someone else makes changes to the source data.
Workspaces will run faster if schema is defined externally.
You don't need to edit the workspace or a dataset to make schema changes.

questions.question: Which port on a FeatureReader will output all the received features, regardless of source feature type?
Schema features contain list attributes describing attribute names, data types, and geometry types.
